title: The Robber Knight's Love
description: Ayla has uncovered a terrible secret: the man she loves is in fact her worst enemy. As a mighty army gathers to destroy her and her people, she must ask herself: will he join them to destroy her? Must she cut him out of her heart to survive? Or is there another way â€“ a way to forgiveness and... love?  Sequel to Robert Thier's #1 Hit 'The Robber Knight'.
author: Robert Thier
